item.title: The Oscar-winning actor died "peacefully" at his home in Middleburg, Virginia on Sunday at the age of 95, according to a statement sent by his PR agency on behalf of his wife, Luciana. #RobertDuvall #US #Godfather #Virginia #BBCNews

item.title: Omar Benguit has spent 23 years in prison for the murder of student Jong-Ok Shin but new evidence suggests he was framed by police, BBC Panorama has found. #DorsetPolice #Bournemouth #UKCrime #BBCPanorama #BBCNews

item.title: His comments come as Iranian and US officials prepare for a second round of talks in Switzerland. Iran will consider compromises to reach a nuclear deal if the US is willing to discuss lifting sanctions, Iranian deputy foreign minister Majid Takht-Ravanch

item.title: A town in northern Italy has been celebrating carnival with its annual Battle of the Oranges. The oranges used during the celebration are not suitable for sale, an organiser said, adding that they are collected and used for fertiliser after the event. #Or

item.title: Jesse Jackson fought for civil rights alongside Martin Luther King Jr in the 1960s and was twice a candidate for the Democratic Party's presidential nomination in 1984 and 1988. #JesseJackson #CivilRights #US #MartinLutherKingJr #News #BBCNews

item.title: The Broomway is a route across flat sands from the shore near Southend-on-Sea to Foulness Island and is home to a Ministry of Defence firing range. Amazon has confirmed it is investigating the incident which unfolded on Saturday. #Broomway #Amazon #Delive
